object.name: KeyboardButtonRequestUsers
object.description: This object defines the criteria used to request suitable users. Information about the selected users will be shared with the bot when the corresponding button is pressed.
object.html_description: This object defines the criteria used to request suitable users. Information about the selected users will be shared with the bot when the corresponding button is pressed. More about requesting users »
object.rst_description: This object defines the criteria used to request suitable users. Information about the selected users will be shared with the bot when the corresponding button is pressed. `More about requesting users Â» <https://core.telegram.org/bots/features#chat-and-user-selection>`_

annotations.description: Signed 32-bit identifier of the request that will be received back in the UsersShared object. Must be unique within the message
annotations.html_description: Signed 32-bit identifier of the request that will be received back in the UsersShared object. Must be unique within the message
annotations.rst_description: Signed 32-bit identifier of the request that will be received back in the :class:`aiogram.types.users_shared.UsersShared` object. Must be unique within the message
annotations.name: request_id

annotations.description: Pass True to request bots, pass False to request regular users. If not specified, no additional restrictions are applied.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Pass True to request bots, pass False to request regular users. If not specified, no additional restrictions are applied.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Pass :code:`True` to request bots, pass :code:`False` to request regular users. If not specified, no additional restrictions are applied.
annotations.name: user_is_bot

annotations.description: Pass True to request premium users, pass False to request non-premium users. If not specified, no additional restrictions are applied.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Pass True to request premium users, pass False to request non-premium users. If not specified, no additional restrictions are applied.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Pass :code:`True` to request premium users, pass :code:`False` to request non-premium users. If not specified, no additional restrictions are applied.
annotations.name: user_is_premium

annotations.description: The maximum number of users to be selected; 1-10. Defaults to 1.
annotations.html_description: Optional. The maximum number of users to be selected; 1-10. Defaults to 1.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The maximum number of users to be selected; 1-10. Defaults to 1.
annotations.name: max_quantity

annotations.description: Pass True to request the users' first and last names
annotations.html_description: Optional. Pass True to request the users' first and last names
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Pass :code:`True` to request the users' first and last names
annotations.name: request_name

annotations.description: Pass True to request the users' usernames
annotations.html_description: Optional. Pass True to request the users' usernames
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Pass :code:`True` to request the users' usernames
annotations.name: request_username

annotations.description: Pass True to request the users' photos
annotations.html_description: Optional. Pass True to request the users' photos
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Pass :code:`True` to request the users' photos
annotations.name: request_photo
